[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/heft](./heft.md) &gt; [IReaddirOptions](./heft.ireaddiroptions.md) &gt; [withFileTypes](./heft.ireaddiroptions.withfiletypes.md)

## IReaddirOptions.withFileTypes property

If true, readdir will return `fs.Dirent` objects instead of strings.

**Signature:**

```typescript
withFileTypes: true;
```
